summary: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.
cast: Sarah Michelle Gellar|Jason Behr|William Mapother|Clea DuVall|KaDee Strickland|Grace Zabriskie|Bill Pullman|Rosa Blasi|Ted Raimi|Ryo Ishibashi|Yôko Maki|Yuya Ozeki|Takako Fuji|Takashi Matsuyama|Hiroshi Matsunaga|Hajime Okayama|Yoshiyuki Morishita|Kazuyuki Tsumura|Taigi Kobayashi|Junko Koizumi|Nana Koizumi|Yôichi Okamura|Eiji Ôki|Katsuhiro Oyama|Jotaro Kitamura|Satoshi Ninomiya|Shinji Nomura
title: El grito
